meanings.definition: The act of running a marathon.
meanings.sent1: Marathoning requires great endurance and determination.
meanings.sent2: She completed her first marathoning event last weekend.
meanings.sent3: After months of training, he finally achieved his goal of marathoning.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to marathoning is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of marathoning is palpable at the starting line.

meanings.definition: Engaging in a long and arduous activity or task without stopping.
meanings.sent1: He is marathoning through his work assignments to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent2: They are marathoning their way through the jungle to reach the hidden temple.
meanings.sent3: She was marathoning through her chores to finish before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The team is marathoning through the project to deliver it on time.
meanings.sent5: Marathoning through the obstacle course, he overcame every challenge with determination.
